benchmark_details.name: Large Pre-Train LLM Dataset for Hindi
benchmark_details.overview: The paper proposes a large pre-training dataset in Hindi useful for the Indic language, containing 1.28 billion Hindi tokens collected from various domains, aimed at building foundation LLMs.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate the development of pre-trained language models specifically for Hindi to enhance NLP capabilities.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset may still have flaws or biases affecting the efficacy of trained models.

data.source: Datasets were compiled from various sources including Wikipedia, AI4Bharat IndicParaphrase, Miracl Corpus, Oscar dataset, and others.

methodology.calculation: Data was systematically collected from multiple sources and preprocessed to ensure quality.
methodology.interpretation: The dataset's quality ensures robust training of language models, which should improve various NLP tasks.
